alert.note: Alert for Douglas; Morrison; Todd (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 27 at 12:06PM CST until December 27 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...BLOWING SNOW OVER CENTRAL MINNESOTA CONTINUES... .Strong west winds of 25 to 40 mph will create areas of blowing and drifting snow across portions of central Minnesota through mid afternoon. The Winter Weather Advisory remains in effect for Douglas, Todd and Morrison Counties through 3 PM. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Blowing snow. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Douglas, Morrison and Todd Counties. * WHEN...Until 3 PM CST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
